summary: The amazing story of Daniel, a dolphin who abandons the safety of his pod to explore the ocean and discover the true purpose of his life.
cast: Robbie Daymond|Giovanni Ciccia|Bruno Ascenzo|Karina Jordán|Elsa Olivero|Natalia Parodi|Elva Alcandré|Bruno Odar|Carlos Victoria|Brian W. Roberts|Dina Monaco-Boland|Melissa LaFore|Óscar Carrillo|Dino Gervasoni|Debra L. Repashy|Anneliese Fiedler|Marilyn A. Billone|Steven Booth|Leonardo Torres Descalzi|Hernán Romero|Michael Ferreri|José Sarmiento|Corey J. Holtzberg|Margarita León|Lovro Preprotnik
title: El delfín: La historia de un soñador
